import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAddEmployeesMutation } from '../../redux/services/DZapi'; function AddUpdateData({ id, setShow }) { const [data, setData] = useState({ user_name: '', cnic: '', partner: '', package: '', plan_expiry: '', phone: '', mobile: '', first_name: '', last_name: '', status: true, city: '', major_area: '', minor_area: '', sub_area: '', address: '', comments: '', }); const [addEmployee, { isLoading, isError, error }] = useAddEmployeesMutation(); const closePopup = () => { setShow(false); }; const handleChange = (e) => { setData({ ...data, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleAddUser = async () => { try { const response = await addEmployee({ data }); // Handle successful user creation here (e.g., show a success message) console.log('User added successfully:', response); closePopup(); } catch (err) { // Handle error (e.g., show an error message) console.error('Error adding user:', err); } }; return (
